reviewerName: Jack Ruby "Jack Ruby built the Pyramids"
reviewtext: I have been using SportaPros for over 10 years.  I have gone through 4 pairs (I'm pretty rough on them.)  The sound response is excellent for the price and they fit great (and tight) for when you're training/working out/etc.  Also, you don't look like one of these fools with huge DJ headphones on their heads.
summary: Can't beat the sound quality of these at this price point.
